question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement of companies within the technology industry over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Fetch social media engagement data (likes, comments, etc.) from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube for the identified technology companies over the last year.
Aggregate the social media metrics to determine overall engagement rates for each company in the technology industry.
Generate a report summarizing the findings, highlighting top-performing social media platforms for each company.
